content: chunky chelsea hat by christina lundborg one size skill level easy materials yarn 1 skein chelsea luxe chunky 106 yards or yarn comparable to recommended gauge colorway used in sample chelsea luxe chunky i love ny note see page 2 for more information needles size 9 circular needles 16 long size 9 double-pointed needles dpns stitch glossary k2tog= knit 2 sts together k1 p1 rib even number of sts round 1 rs *k1 p1 repeat from* to end repeat round 1 for k1 p1 rib gauge 12 sts and 24 rnds = 4 over st st with size us 9 needles check gauge for best results hat cast on 66 sts place marker and join for working in the round being careful not to twist work in k1 p1 ribbing until piece measures 2 inches from cast on edge once ribbing is finished continue in stockinette stitch knit every round until piece measures 9 inches from cast on edge shape crown note change to dpns when there are too few sts on needle round 1 decrease *k4 k2tog repeat from *around round 2 and all even rounds knit round 3 decrease *k3 k2tog repeat from *around round 4 knit round 5 decrease *k2tog repeat from * around cut tail pull through remaining stitches finishing make a 4 pompom and secure to top of hat or use a fur pom pom with a snap hat also looks beautiful without a pom pom block for final touches i recommend steam blocking for this pattern note you can also add a strand of glitter or sparkle lurex which will not change or effect the gauge of your hat sample used a strand of kremke soul wool stellaris in silver 47% viscose 41% polyester 12% metallic yarn 560 meters/25 grams finished measurements width 9 inches length 10 inches thanks so much for downloading my pattern i hope you receive as much joy from knitting and wearing hats as i do xoxoxoxoxoxo
